title: Ubuntu Security Notice
description: A schema for describing a a security update in Ubuntu.

id.description: The Security Notice id, e.g USN-0001-1

cves.description: A list of CVEs related to this Notice

items.description: CVE ID in the form of CVE-YYYY-NNNN

description.description: The description of the issue as written by the Security Team

is_hidden.description: Temporary field used for testing purposes

releases.description: An entry for each release name

summary.description: Source package name and type of update, e.g. python-django vulnerability

title.description: Similar to summary, but using the Official project name instead of source package name
